description:
A wish-granting weevil shows up at Keroro`s doorstep and promises to grant his wish if he`ll just fulfill all the conditions.  But what could Keroro`s wish be?  Then Natsumi falls in love with an adorable pet trash bag Kululu invented.  Something so cute can`t possibly be dangerous, right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Weevil That Grants Dreams / Keroro, Do Your Best, Trash Bag!
ケロロ 夢をかなえるゾウムシ であります / ケロロ がんばれゴミ袋! であります
